TopicTitle: What should I do for a new mission report?

Articles.Content:
So, I'm making a new mission report -with a species other than kerbals.

Okay, okay put your pitchforks down for a second plez!?

There's two options so far: Da Orks or some 'Lil Kobold bois. The general idea of this is that either species also lives on Kerbin and may get into some competition with the kerbals themselves. If you have any other ideas for what I could do (planet packs, mods maybe other species options) please comment bacuase I'd be really interested to hear them!

 

Edit: Penguins, because Learn to Fly 3

Edited January 8, 2021 by The Dressian Exploder
